tool_description: What the world reported about Africa
name: Report-Africa Live
title: Report-Africa Live

api_list.name: Get individual News Source
api_list.description: Get News about Africa From Specific Source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://report-africa-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/Euronews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "report-africa-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://report-africa-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspapper}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "report-africa-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
